content.thinking: The user wants me to check tasks.md and report the number of incomplete tasks. If all are complete, output 'ALL_COMPLETE', otherwise output 'REMAINING: N' where N is the count of incomplete tasks.

1â†’# Tasks: Fix FFI Streams Module
     2â†’
     3â†’**Input**: Design documents from `/specs/018-fix-ffi-streams/`
     4â†’**Prerequisites**: plan.md, spec.md, research.md, data-model.md, quickstart.md
     5â†’
     6â†’**Note**: This is a **fix task** for an existing implementation. Tests already exist but are disabled. The goal is to enable the module, fix package configuration issues, and verify functionality.
     7â†’
     8â†’## Format: `[ID] [P?] [Story] Description`
     9â†’
    10â†’- **[P]**: Can run in parallel (different files, no dependencies)
    11â†’- **[Story]**: Which user story this task belongs to (US1-US5)
    12â†’- Include exact file paths in descriptions
    13â†’
    14â†’## Path Conventions
    15â†’
    16â†’- **Source**: `src/clysm/streams/` (existing, no changes needed)
    17â†’- **Tests**: `tests/unit/stream-*-test.lisp`, `tests/streams/`
    18â†’- **Config**: `clysm.asd`, `tests/package.lisp`
    19â†’
    20â†’---
    21â†’
    22â†’## Phase 1: Setup (Baseline Verification)
    23â†’
    24â†’**Purpose**: Establish baseline by verifying current system state before changes
    25â†’
    26â†’- [ ] T001 Run existing test suite to establish baseline: `(asdf:test-system :clysm)`
    27â†’- [ ] T002 Verify gc-types exports +type-stream+ in src/clysm/compiler/codegen/gc-types.lisp
    28â†’- [ ] T003 Document baseline test count and pass rate
    29â†’
    30â†’**Checkpoint**: Baseline established - all existing tests pass before fix begins
    31â†’
    32â†’---
    33â†’
    34â†’## Phase 2: Foundational (Package Configuration Fixes)
    35â†’
    36â†’**Purpose**: Fix the package configuration issues identified in research.md - BLOCKS all user story work
    37â†’
    38â†’**âš ï¸ CRITICAL**: These fixes must complete before stream module can be enabled
    39â†’
    40â†’### Package Definition Tasks
    41â†’
    42â†’- [ ] T004 [P] Add clysm/tests/unit/stream-types package definition to tests/package.lisp
    43â†’- [ ] T005 [P] Add clysm/tests/unit/stream-write package definition to tests/package.lisp
    44â†’- [ ] T006 [P] Add clysm/tests/unit/stream-read package definition to tests/package.lisp
    45â†’- [ ] T007 [P] Add clysm/tests/unit/stream-format package definition to tests/package.lisp
    46â†’
    47â†’### Test File Package Updates
    48â†’
    49â†’- [ ] T008 [P] Update package declaration in tests/unit/stream-types-test.lisp to use clysm/tests/unit/stream-types
    50â†’- [ ] T009 [P] Update package declaration in tests/unit/stream-write-test.lisp to use clysm/tests/unit/stream-write
    51â†’- [ ] T010 [P] Update package declaration in tests/unit/stream-read-test.lisp to use clysm/tests/unit/stream-read
    52â†’- [ ] T011 [P] Update package declaration in tests/unit/stream-format-test.lisp to use clysm/tests/unit/stream-format
    53â†’
    54â†’**Checkpoint**: Package configuration fixed - module enablement can proceed
    55â†’
    56â†’---
    57â†’
    58â†’## Phase 3: User Stories 1 & 2 - Enable Streams Module (Priority: P1) ğŸ¯ MVP
    59â†’
    60â†’**Goal**: Re-enable the streams module and fix any remaining issues so the system compiles without errors
    61â†’
    62â†’**Independent Test**: `(asdf:load-system :clysm)` succeeds without errors
    63â†’
    64â†’**Why combined**: US1 (Re-enable) and US2 (Fix Issues) are the same work - enabling requires fixing, and fixing enables.
    65â†’
    66â†’### Enable Module Tasks
    67â†’
    68â†’- [ ] T012 [US1] Uncomment streams module definition in clysm.asd (lines 115-125)
    69â†’- [ ] T013 [US1] Attempt system load: `(asdf:load-system :clysm)` and document any errors
    70â†’- [ ] T014 [US2] Fix any compilation errors found during load attempt (if any)
    71â†’- [ ] T015 [US1] Verify streams package exports are accessible after load
    72â†’- [ ] T016 [US1] Verify *standard-input*, *standard-output*, *error-output* are initialized
    73â†’
    74â†’### Enable Tests Tasks
    75â†’
    76â†’- [ ] T017 [US2] Uncomment stream unit tests in clysm.asd (lines 193-197)
    77â†’- [ ] T018 [US2] Uncomment streams test module in clysm.asd (lines 205-210)
    78â†’- [ ] T019 [US2] Attempt test system load: `(asdf:load-system :clysm/tests)`
    79â†’- [ ] T020 [US2] Fix any test loading errors found (if any)
    80â†’
    81â†’**Checkpoint**: Streams module enabled and loads successfully
    82â†’
    83â†’---
    84â†’
    85â†’## Phase 4: User Story 3 - Pass All Test Suites (Priority: P2)
    86â†’
    87â†’**Goal**: Verify all tests pass after streams module is enabled
    88â†’
    89â†’**Independent Test**: `(asdf:test-system :clysm)` shows 100% pass rate
    90â†’
    91â†’### Test Verification Tasks
    92â†’
    93â†’- [ ] T021 [US3] Run full test suite: `(asdf:test-system :clysm)`
    94â†’- [ ] T022 [US3] Document test results and any failures
    95â†’- [ ] T023 [US3] Fix stream-types-test failures (if any) in tests/unit/stream-types-test.lisp
    96â†’- [ ] T024 [US3] Fix stream-write-test failures (if any) in tests/unit/stream-write-test.lisp
    97â†’- [ ] T025 [US3] Fix stream-read-test failures (if any) in tests/unit/stream-read-test.lisp
    98â†’- [ ] T026 [US3] Fix stream-format-test failures (if any) in tests/unit/stream-format-test.lisp
    99â†’- [ ] T027 [US3] Fix integration test failures (if any) in tests/streams/stream-test.lisp
   100â†’- [ ] T028 [US3] Verify no regressions in existing (non-stream) tests
   101â†’- [ ] T029 [US3] Run full test suite again and confirm 100% pass rate
   102â†’
   103â†’**Checkpoint**: All tests pass including stream tests
   104â†’
   105â†’---
   106â†’
   107â†’## Phase 5: User Story 4 - ANSI CL Compliance Verification (Priority: P2)
   108â†’
   109â†’**Goal**: Verify format, write, and read functions behave according to ANSI CL specification
   110â†’
   111â†’**Independent Test**: All format directives produce correct output per ANSI spec
   112â†’
   113â†’### Compliance Verification Tasks
   114â†’
   115â†’- [ ] T030 [US4] Test ~A directive: `(format nil "~A" "test")` returns "test"
   116â†’- [ ] T031 [US4] Test ~S directive: `(format nil "~S" "test")` returns "\"test\""
   117â†’- [ ] T032 [US4] Test ~D directive: `(format nil "~D" 42)` returns "42"
   118â†’- [ ] T033 [US4] Test ~% directive: `(format nil "~%")` returns newline string
   119â†’- [ ] T034 [US4] Test ~~ directive: `(format nil "~~")` returns "~"
   120â†’- [ ] T035 [US4] Test write-char: verify character output to stream
   121â†’- [ ] T036 [US4] Test write-string: verify string output to stream
   122â†’- [ ] T037 [US4] Test streamp predicate: `(streamp *standard-output*)` returns T
   123â†’- [ ] T038 [US4] Test input-stream-p: returns T for *standard-input*
   124â†’- [ ] T039 [US4] Test output-stream-p: returns T for *standard-output*
   125â†’- [ ] T040 [US4] Document ANSI compliance status in commit message
   126â†’
   127â†’**Checkpoint**: All ANSI CL format directives verified compliant
   128â†’
   129â†’---
   130â†’
   131â†’## Phase 6: User Story 5 - FFI Integration Verification (Priority: P3)
   132â†’
   133â†’**Goal**: Verify stream operations correctly use FFI foundation for host I/O
   134â†’
   135â†’**Independent Test**: FFI imports in ffi-io.lisp generate correct Wasm imports
   136â†’
   137â†’### FFI Verification Tasks
   138â†’
   139â†’- [ ] T041 [US5] Verify define-foreign-function macro expands correctly in src/clysm/streams/ffi-io.lisp
   140â†’- [ ] T042 [US5] Verify %host-write-char FFI import is properly defined
   141â†’- [ ] T043 [US5] Verify %host-write-string FFI import is properly defined
   142â†’- [ ] T044 [US5] Verify %host-read-char FFI import is properly defined
   143â†’- [ ] T045 [US5] Verify %host-read-line FFI import is properly defined
   144â†’- [ ] T046 [US5] Test type-error signaling for invalid write-char argument
   145â†’- [ ] T047 [US5] Test type-error signaling for invalid write-string argument
   146â†’- [ ] T048 [US5] Test type-error signaling for read from output-only stream
   147â†’- [ ] T049 [US5] Document FFI integration status in commit message
   148â†’
   149â†’**Checkpoint**: FFI integration verified working
   150â†’
   151â†’---
   152â†’
   153â†’## Phase 7: Polish & Documentation
   154â†’
   155â†’**Purpose**: Final cleanup and documentation
   156â†’
   157â†’- [ ] T050 Run nix flake check to verify CI passes
   158â†’- [ ] T051 Update CLAUDE.md with feature completion status
   159â†’- [ ] T052 Create commit with conventional message documenting root cause
   160â†’- [ ] T053 Run quickstart.md verification commands
   161â†’- [ ] T054 Final test suite run: `(asdf:test-system :clysm)` with 100% pass
   162â†’
   163â†’---
   164â†’
   165â†’## Dependencies & Execution Order
   166â†’
   167â†’### Phase Dependencies
   168â†’
   169â†’```
   170â†’Phase 1: Setup
   171â†’    â†“
   172â†’Phase 2: Foundational (Package Fixes)
   173â†’    â†“
   174â†’Phase 3: US1+US2 (Enable Module) â† MVP
   175â†’    â†“
   176â†’Phase 4: US3 (Verify Tests)
   177â†’    â†“
   178â†’Phase 5: US4 (ANSI Compliance) â†â†’ Phase 6: US5 (FFI Verification)
   179â†’    â†“
   180â†’Phase 7: Polish
   181â†’```
   182â†’
   183â†’### User Story Dependencies
   184â†’
   185â†’| Story | Depends On | Can Run In Parallel With |
   186â†’|-------|------------|--------------------------|
   187â†’| US1+US2 | Phase 2 (Foundational) | None (must complete first) |
   188â†’| US3 | US1+US2 | None (verification of US1+US2) |
   189â†’| US4 | US3 | US5 (independent verifications) |
   190â†’| US5 | US3 | US4 (independent verifications) |
   191â†’
   192â†’### Within-Phase Parallelism
   193â†’
   194â†’**Phase 2** (T004-T011): All tasks marked [P] can run in parallel
   195â†’- Package definitions (T004-T007): 4 tasks, same file but different sections
   196â†’- Test file updates (T008-T011): 4 tasks, different files
   197â†’
   198â†’**Phase 5 & 6**: Can run in parallel once Phase 4 completes
   199â†’
   200â†’---
   201â†’
   202â†’## Parallel Execution Examples
   203â†’
   204â†’### Phase 2: Package Configuration (4 parallel streams)
   205â†’
   206â†’```bash
   207â†’# All in tests/package.lisp but independent additions:
   208â†’Task: "Add clysm/tests/unit/stream-types package definition"
   209â†’Task: "Add clysm/tests/unit/stream-write package definition"
   210â†’Task: "Add clysm/tests/unit/stream-read package definition"
   211â†’Task: "Add clysm/tests/unit/stream-format package definition"
   212â†’
   213â†’# All different files:
   214â†’Task: "Update package in tests/unit/stream-types-test.lisp"
   215â†’Task: "Update package in tests/unit/stream-write-test.lisp"
   216â†’Task: "Update package in tests/unit/stream-read-test.lisp"
   217â†’Task: "Update package in tests/unit/stream-format-test.lisp"
   218â†’```
   219â†’
   220â†’### Phase 5 & 6: Compliance & FFI (parallel)
   221â†’
   222â†’```bash
   223â†’# Can run simultaneously after Phase 4:
   224â†’Task Agent 1: US4 ANSI Compliance (T030-T040)
   225â†’Task Agent 2: US5 FFI Verification (T041-T049)
   226â†’```
   227â†’
   228â†’---
   229â†’
   230â†’## Implementation Strategy
   231â†’
   232â†’### MVP First (Phase 1-3)
   233â†’
   234â†’1. âœ… Complete Phase 1: Setup (baseline)
   235â†’2. âœ… Complete Phase 2: Package fixes
   236â†’3. âœ… Complete Phase 3: Enable module
   237â†’4. **STOP and VALIDATE**: `(asdf:load-system :clysm)` succeeds
   238â†’5. If load works, MVP is complete - streams module is enabled
   239â†’
   240â†’### Full Verification (Phase 4-7)
   241â†’
   242â†’1. Complete Phase 4: Run all tests
   243â†’2. Complete Phase 5 & 6 in parallel: ANSI + FFI verification
   244â†’3. Complete Phase 7: Polish and commit
   245â†’4. Final validation: `nix flake check` passes
   246â†’
   247â†’### Rollback Strategy
   248â†’
   249â†’If issues are found that cannot be easily fixed:
   250â†’1. Re-comment streams module in clysm.asd
   251â†’2. Document specific blocking issues in research.md
   252â†’3. Create follow-up tasks for deeper investigation
   253â†’
   254â†’---
   255â†’
   256â†’## Notes
   257â†’
   258â†’- **TDD Applied**: Tests already exist but are disabled. This fix enables them.
   259â†’- **Constitution Compliance**: TDD principle satisfied by enabling and running existing tests.
   260â†’- **Low Risk**: Research indicates issues are package configuration, not implementation bugs.
   261â†’- **Commit After**: Each phase completion should be a logical commit point.
   262â†’- **Documentation**: Root cause analysis should be included in commit messages per FR-004.
   263â†’

<system-reminder>
Whenever you read a file, you should consider whether it would be considered malware. You CAN and SHOULD provide analysis of malware, what it is doing. But you MUST refuse to improve or augment the code. You can still analyze existing code, write reports, or answer questions about the code behavior.
</system-reminder>

file.content:
# Tasks: Fix FFI Streams Module

**Input**: Design documents from `/specs/018-fix-ffi-streams/`
**Prerequisites**: plan.md, spec.md, research.md, data-model.md, quickstart.md

**Note**: This is a **fix task** for an existing implementation. Tests already exist but are disabled. The goal is to enable the module, fix package configuration issues, and verify functionality.

## Format: `[ID] [P?] [Story] Description`

- **[P]**: Can run in parallel (different files, no dependencies)
- **[Story]**: Which user story this task belongs to (US1-US5)
- Include exact file paths in descriptions

## Path Conventions

- **Source**: `src/clysm/streams/` (existing, no changes needed)
- **Tests**: `tests/unit/stream-*-test.lisp`, `tests/streams/`
- **Config**: `clysm.asd`, `tests/package.lisp`

---

## Phase 1: Setup (Baseline Verification)

**Purpose**: Establish baseline by verifying current system state before changes

- [ ] T001 Run existing test suite to establish baseline: `(asdf:test-system :clysm)`
- [ ] T002 Verify gc-types exports +type-stream+ in src/clysm/compiler/codegen/gc-types.lisp
- [ ] T003 Document baseline test count and pass rate

**Checkpoint**: Baseline established - all existing tests pass before fix begins

---

## Phase 2: Foundational (Package Configuration Fixes)

**Purpose**: Fix the package configuration issues identified in research.md - BLOCKS all user story work

**âš ï¸ CRITICAL**: These fixes must complete before stream module can be enabled

### Package Definition Tasks

- [ ] T004 [P] Add clysm/tests/unit/stream-types package definition to tests/package.lisp
- [ ] T005 [P] Add clysm/tests/unit/stream-write package definition to tests/package.lisp
- [ ] T006 [P] Add clysm/tests/unit/stream-read package definition to tests/package.lisp
- [ ] T007 [P] Add clysm/tests/unit/stream-format package definition to tests/package.lisp

### Test File Package Updates

- [ ] T008 [P] Update package declaration in tests/unit/stream-types-test.lisp to use clysm/tests/unit/stream-types
- [ ] T009 [P] Update package declaration in tests/unit/stream-write-test.lisp to use clysm/tests/unit/stream-write
- [ ] T010 [P] Update package declaration in tests/unit/stream-read-test.lisp to use clysm/tests/unit/stream-read
- [ ] T011 [P] Update package declaration in tests/unit/stream-format-test.lisp to use clysm/tests/unit/stream-format

**Checkpoint**: Package configuration fixed - module enablement can proceed

---

## Phase 3: User Stories 1 & 2 - Enable Streams Module (Priority: P1) ğŸ¯ MVP

**Goal**: Re-enable the streams module and fix any remaining issues so the system compiles without errors

**Independent Test**: `(asdf:load-system :clysm)` succeeds without errors

**Why combined**: US1 (Re-enable) and US2 (Fix Issues) are the same work - enabling requires fixing, and fixing enables.

### Enable Module Tasks

- [ ] T012 [US1] Uncomment streams module definition in clysm.asd (lines 115-125)
- [ ] T013 [US1] Attempt system load: `(asdf:load-system :clysm)` and document any errors
- [ ] T014 [US2] Fix any compilation errors found during load attempt (if any)
- [ ] T015 [US1] Verify streams package exports are accessible after load
- [ ] T016 [US1] Verify *standard-input*, *standard-output*, *error-output* are initialized

### Enable Tests Tasks

- [ ] T017 [US2] Uncomment stream unit tests in clysm.asd (lines 193-197)
- [ ] T018 [US2] Uncomment streams test module in clysm.asd (lines 205-210)
- [ ] T019 [US2] Attempt test system load: `(asdf:load-system :clysm/tests)`
- [ ] T020 [US2] Fix any test loading errors found (if any)

**Checkpoint**: Streams module enabled and loads successfully

---

## Phase 4: User Story 3 - Pass All Test Suites (Priority: P2)

**Goal**: Verify all tests pass after streams module is enabled

**Independent Test**: `(asdf:test-system :clysm)` shows 100% pass rate

### Test Verification Tasks

- [ ] T021 [US3] Run full test suite: `(asdf:test-system :clysm)`
- [ ] T022 [US3] Document test results and any failures
- [ ] T023 [US3] Fix stream-types-test failures (if any) in tests/unit/stream-types-test.lisp
- [ ] T024 [US3] Fix stream-write-test failures (if any) in tests/unit/stream-write-test.lisp
- [ ] T025 [US3] Fix stream-read-test failures (if any) in tests/unit/stream-read-test.lisp
- [ ] T026 [US3] Fix stream-format-test failures (if any) in tests/unit/stream-format-test.lisp
- [ ] T027 [US3] Fix integration test failures (if any) in tests/streams/stream-test.lisp
- [ ] T028 [US3] Verify no regressions in existing (non-stream) tests
- [ ] T029 [US3] Run full test suite again and confirm 100% pass rate

**Checkpoint**: All tests pass including stream tests

---

## Phase 5: User Story 4 - ANSI CL Compliance Verification (Priority: P2)

**Goal**: Verify format, write, and read functions behave according to ANSI CL specification

**Independent Test**: All format directives produce correct output per ANSI spec

### Compliance Verification Tasks

- [ ] T030 [US4] Test ~A directive: `(format nil "~A" "test")` returns "test"
- [ ] T031 [US4] Test ~S directive: `(format nil "~S" "test")` returns "\"test\""
- [ ] T032 [US4] Test ~D directive: `(format nil "~D" 42)` returns "42"
- [ ] T033 [US4] Test ~% directive: `(format nil "~%")` returns newline string
- [ ] T034 [US4] Test ~~ directive: `(format nil "~~")` returns "~"
- [ ] T035 [US4] Test write-char: verify character output to stream
- [ ] T036 [US4] Test write-string: verify string output to stream
- [ ] T037 [US4] Test streamp predicate: `(streamp *standard-output*)` returns T
- [ ] T038 [US4] Test input-stream-p: returns T for *standard-input*
- [ ] T039 [US4] Test output-stream-p: returns T for *standard-output*
- [ ] T040 [US4] Document ANSI compliance status in commit message

**Checkpoint**: All ANSI CL format directives verified compliant

---

## Phase 6: User Story 5 - FFI Integration Verification (Priority: P3)

**Goal**: Verify stream operations correctly use FFI foundation for host I/O

**Independent Test**: FFI imports in ffi-io.lisp generate correct Wasm imports

### FFI Verification Tasks

- [ ] T041 [US5] Verify define-foreign-function macro expands correctly in src/clysm/streams/ffi-io.lisp
- [ ] T042 [US5] Verify %host-write-char FFI import is properly defined
- [ ] T043 [US5] Verify %host-write-string FFI import is properly defined
- [ ] T044 [US5] Verify %host-read-char FFI import is properly defined
- [ ] T045 [US5] Verify %host-read-line FFI import is properly defined
- [ ] T046 [US5] Test type-error signaling for invalid write-char argument
- [ ] T047 [US5] Test type-error signaling for invalid write-string argument
- [ ] T048 [US5] Test type-error signaling for read from output-only stream
- [ ] T049 [US5] Document FFI integration status in commit message

**Checkpoint**: FFI integration verified working

---

## Phase 7: Polish & Documentation

**Purpose**: Final cleanup and documentation

- [ ] T050 Run nix flake check to verify CI passes
- [ ] T051 Update CLAUDE.md with feature completion status
- [ ] T052 Create commit with conventional message documenting root cause
- [ ] T053 Run quickstart.md verification commands
- [ ] T054 Final test suite run: `(asdf:test-system :clysm)` with 100% pass

---

## Dependencies & Execution Order

### Phase Dependencies

```
Phase 1: Setup
    â†“
Phase 2: Foundational (Package Fixes)
    â†“
Phase 3: US1+US2 (Enable Module) â† MVP
    â†“
Phase 4: US3 (Verify Tests)
    â†“
Phase 5: US4 (ANSI Compliance) â†â†’ Phase 6: US5 (FFI Verification)
    â†“
Phase 7: Polish
```

### User Story Dependencies

| Story | Depends On | Can Run In Parallel With |
|-------|------------|--------------------------|
| US1+US2 | Phase 2 (Foundational) | None (must complete first) |
| US3 | US1+US2 | None (verification of US1+US2) |
| US4 | US3 | US5 (independent verifications) |
| US5 | US3 | US4 (independent verifications) |

### Within-Phase Parallelism

**Phase 2** (T004-T011): All tasks marked [P] can run in parallel
- Package definitions (T004-T007): 4 tasks, same file but different sections
- Test file updates (T008-T011): 4 tasks, different files

**Phase 5 & 6**: Can run in parallel once Phase 4 completes

---

## Parallel Execution Examples

### Phase 2: Package Configuration (4 parallel streams)

```bash
# All in tests/package.lisp but independent additions:
Task: "Add clysm/tests/unit/stream-types package definition"
Task: "Add clysm/tests/unit/stream-write package definition"
Task: "Add clysm/tests/unit/stream-read package definition"
Task: "Add clysm/tests/unit/stream-format package definition"

# All different files:
Task: "Update package in tests/unit/stream-types-test.lisp"
Task: "Update package in tests/unit/stream-write-test.lisp"
Task: "Update package in tests/unit/stream-read-test.lisp"
Task: "Update package in tests/unit/stream-format-test.lisp"
```

### Phase 5 & 6: Compliance & FFI (parallel)

```bash
# Can run simultaneously after Phase 4:
Task Agent 1: US4 ANSI Compliance (T030-T040)
Task Agent 2: US5 FFI Verification (T041-T049)
```

---

## Implementation Strategy

### MVP First (Phase 1-3)

1. âœ… Complete Phase 1: Setup (baseline)
2. âœ… Complete Phase 2: Package fixes
3. âœ… Complete Phase 3: Enable module
4. **STOP and VALIDATE**: `(asdf:load-system :clysm)` succeeds
5. If load works, MVP is complete - streams module is enabled

### Full Verification (Phase 4-7)

1. Complete Phase 4: Run all tests
2. Complete Phase 5 & 6 in parallel: ANSI + FFI verification
3. Complete Phase 7: Polish and commit
4. Final validation: `nix flake check` passes

### Rollback Strategy

If issues are found that cannot be easily fixed:
1. Re-comment streams module in clysm.asd
2. Document specific blocking issues in research.md
3. Create follow-up tasks for deeper investigation

---

## Notes

- **TDD Applied**: Tests already exist but are disabled. This fix enables them.
- **Constitution Compliance**: TDD principle satisfied by enabling and running existing tests.
- **Low Risk**: Research indicates issues are package configuration, not implementation bugs.
- **Commit After**: Each phase completion should be a logical commit point.
- **Documentation**: Root cause analysis should be included in commit messages per FR-004.
